attributes.action: Award UK Key Workers a pay rise based in relation to last pay rise given to MP’s
attributes.additional_details:
Key workers will be called upon always to support the country in time of need. They are mostly the lowest paid in society. 
The Government should increase their (Key Workers) pay to show our dependence on them during dire times as the foundation of the country.
attributes.background: Keys workers, although the corner stone of our society are never in the decision making level and left out when in comes to appreciating their contribution to society. The Government  needs to understand this and support key workers as the left out unrepresented essential pillar of society

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting the wages of people outside of the public sector. 

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328754
